high.title: Improve error messages in spec validation
high.description: Validation error messages for nested fields could be more specific and actionable, including the exact field path that failed validation.
high.recommendation: Add field path context to ValidationError exceptions

high.title: Add input path sanitization
high.description: User-provided file paths should be validated and sanitized to prevent potential path traversal issues.
high.recommendation: Add path validation utility to ensure paths stay within project bounds

medium.title: Add progress indicators for long-running phases
medium.description: Long-running phases provide no feedback to the user about progress.
medium.recommendation: Implement a progress bar or status updates during phase execution

medium.title: Implement accurate token counting
medium.description: Current token counting is approximation-based, which affects cost tracking accuracy.
medium.recommendation: Integrate tiktoken library for accurate token counting per model

medium.title: Add --dry-run mode
medium.description: Users cannot preview what phases would execute without actually running them.
medium.recommendation: Add --dry-run flag that shows planned actions without execution

medium.title: Add shell completion support
medium.description: CLI lacks tab completion for commands and arguments.
medium.recommendation: Add shell completion scripts for bash/zsh using click's completion support

low.title: Enhance expert selection with semantic matching
low.description: Current keyword-trigger based expert selection could miss relevant experts for nuanced requests.
low.recommendation: Consider adding embedding-based semantic matching as a secondary selection method

low.title: Add status command
low.description: No quick way to inspect current project and phase states.
low.recommendation: Add 'helix status' command for project state inspection
